ticket.title: expire_action silently failing with :as routes
ticket.original-body:
I am having problems with expiring action caches in Rails 2.2. I have a configured the route for a controller named Pages to appear as "pagine" using the :as option. I am using the file based cache and the caching works and the created files match the route (e.g. /pagine/1). However when I try and expire the action it looks for a file that matches the controller name rather than the name I gave.
So rather than trying to delete /pagine/1 it tries to delete /pages/1 and so the action is never expired.
